evidence.claim: Flare Health utilizes AWS for scalable cloud services.
Flare Health's platform is built on FHIR standards for interoperability.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations for secure patient data handling.
Integration with Twilio for communication APIs.
Usage of HL7 standards for health information exchange.
